description.narrative: The proposed intervention aims to contribute to achieving Strategic Objective #3 as defined in the IOM Strategic Plan 2019-2021, i.e. advancing well-being of society and migrants through stronger migration governance and development. This project aims to achieve this by enhancing the capacity of the fraud detection units by expanding capacity to regional branches and Hargeisa and Berbera. Furthermore, it will contribute to the expansion of the passport enrolment centre by establishing a new hub in one of the five IND Branches. Lastly, the project contributes to the sustainable construction including solar power features of a new regional offices for the IND Branch 4 in Dhusamareeb and one in Buroa for SIBC regional office as well as two border posts along the Somali-Ethiopian border. It will focus organizational and human capacity building at the centralized level of the Federal Government of Somalia (FGoS) in Mogadishu, its Regional Branch and immigration departments in Hargeisa and Berbera.
